text: The American Pygmy, also known as the Pygmy or African Pygmy is breed of dwarf goat. It is small, compact and commonly kept as a pet. It comes from the West African Dwarf breeds of West Africa. Around 1930 and 1960, animals in the West African Dwarf group were taken to the United States for use as zoo animals, or for research. Some were bred to be pets and were officially made a breed in 1975. == Gallery == Category:Goat breeds
title: American Pygmy
